languages.text: At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, an enemy suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} inflicted by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} must make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If failed, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} is removed and the enemy falls {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} until the start of their next turn.

traits.locale_text: At the start of the turn of any enemy under the effects of Executioner's burning, the enemy must make a Willpower save, or drop prone, removing burning.

At the start of their turn, an enemy under the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} applied by the Executioner must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance test. If failed, the enemy removes the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} and falls {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} until the start of their next turn.

At the start of their turn, an enemy under the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} applied by the Executioner must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance test. If failed, the enemy removes the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} and falls {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} until the start of their next turn.

At the start of their turn, an enemy suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} inflicted by the Executioner must make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance test. If failed, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} is removed and the enemy falls {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} until the start of their next turn.

At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, an enemy suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} inflicted by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} must make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If failed, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} is removed and the enemy falls {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} until the start of their next turn.

languages.text: Al comienzo de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, los enemigos que sufran de una {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} infligida por el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g} deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}. Si fallan, su {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} se elimina y quedan {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribados{/g} hasta el comienzo de su próximo turno.
languages.original_text: At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, an enemy suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} inflicted by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} must make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If failed, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} is removed and the enemy falls {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} until the start of their next turn.

traits.locale_text: Al comienzo de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, los enemigos que sufran de una {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} infligida por el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g} deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}. Si fallan, su {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} se elimina y quedan {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribados{/g} hasta el comienzo de su próximo turno.

languages.text: 自分の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}による{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}を受けた敵1体は、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受ける。失敗した場合、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}が取り除かれ、その敵は自分の次のターン開始時まで{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}する。
languages.original_text: At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, an enemy suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} inflicted by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} must make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If failed, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} is removed and the enemy falls {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} until the start of their next turn.

traits.locale_text: 自分の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}による{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}を受けた敵1体は、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受ける。失敗した場合、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}が取り除かれ、その敵は自分の次のターン開始時まで{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}する。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，受到{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}效果影响的敌人需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}。若检定失败，则会移除{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}效果，同时陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态，持续至下个回合。
languages.original_text: At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, an enemy suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} inflicted by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} must make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If failed, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} is removed and the enemy falls {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} until the start of their next turn.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，受到{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}效果影响的敌人需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}。若检定失败，则会移除{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}效果，同时陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态，持续至下个回合。

languages.text: Ein vom {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g} mit {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g} belegter Gegner muss zu Beginn seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} bestehen. Misslingt diese, wird {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g} entfernt und der Gegner wird bis zum Beginn seines nächsten Zuges {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}niedergestreckt{/g}.
languages.original_text: At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, an enemy suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} inflicted by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} must make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If failed, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} is removed and the enemy falls {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} until the start of their next turn.

traits.locale_text: Ein vom {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g} mit {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g} belegter Gegner muss zu Beginn seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} bestehen. Misslingt diese, wird {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g} entfernt und der Gegner wird bis zum Beginn seines nächsten Zuges {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}niedergestreckt{/g}.

languages.text: Au début de leur {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, les ennemis souffrant de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} infligé par l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteur{/g} doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g}. En cas d'échec, l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} est dissipé et l'ennemi devient {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}paralysé{/g} jusqu'au début de son prochain tour.
languages.original_text: At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, an enemy suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} inflicted by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} must make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If failed, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} is removed and the enemy falls {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} until the start of their next turn.

traits.locale_text: Au début de leur {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, les ennemis souffrant de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} infligé par l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteur{/g} doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g}. En cas d'échec, l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} est dissipé et l'ennemi devient {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}paralysé{/g} jusqu'au début de son prochain tour.

languages.text: В начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} противник, на которого {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палач{/g} наложил {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g}, совершает проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}. В случае провала {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g} снимается, а этот противник оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинут{/g} до начала своего следующего хода.

If failed, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} is removed and the enemy falls {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} until the start of their next turn.

traits.locale_text: В начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} противник, на которого {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палач{/g} наложил {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g}, совершает проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}. В случае провала {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g} снимается, а этот противник оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинут{/g} до начала своего следующего хода.

В начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} противник, на которого {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палач{/g} наложил {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g}, совершает проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}.
